name: Dungeon Of Doom Puzzle
description: Guide the little viking hero through 100 levels of monsters, traps and danger in this puzzle game. All you have with you is your puzzle solving skills, agility and timing.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: 1,6 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9400M G graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
